name: RO-DIE-O!
description:
made in 24 hours for gmtk 2022 (theme : roll of the dice)

shoot the dice before they crush you!
aim for the lowest face values to kill them faster!
your gun fully reloads on kill

controls

  • move with wasd
  • jump with space
  • shoot with left mouse
  • reload with R
  • tweak your aim sensitivity with scroll wheel
  • fullscreen with F
  • toggle mouse cursor with T

design, code by pataya
art by mim
gun model from aws_3d
